plot: A rube admires a poster for a burlesque show that shows scantily-clad women. After he runs off a committee of "do-gooder" women arrives and pins skirts and blouses over the risque pictures.
title: The Committee on Art
plot_es: A rube admires a poster for a burlesque show that shows scantily-clad women. After he runs off a committee of "do-gooder" women arrives and pins skirts and blouses over the risque pictures.
plot_en: A rube admires a poster for a burlesque show that shows scantily-clad women. After he runs off a committee of "do-gooder" women arrives and pins skirts and blouses over the risque pictures.
